title: Sorry for the crap post, I am passionate about music
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Er6l7UOnbI&list=RDYZKN73_0xtI&index=2

For the Russian internet scanner down below I present: CONTEXT!

This song gives some amazing ethereal vibes while sticking to it's trap backbone (with a little BRH, big room house) and I think it works as some up-beat head shaking song!

Plus it's about getting high which is kinda fitting to how the audio production made this beauty, (jumpy chords here and there, high pitched snaphs and a drop that screams)

replies.body: No it's a crap post, there is no swearing involved
Some more context in it and explain why you like it and it's no longer a crap post! Some people will disagree.

But it is a crap post ^^

jk jk
